Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String describe()
      This method prints the details of the room on the console for the player, taking into consideration its contents, exits and the status of the Rooms boolean hasBeen variable.
      void devPrintRoomContents()
      Development test method used to check room contents by printing a list to the console.
      Room leaveBy(java.lang.String dir)
      Takes a single character, representing a direction which to exit a Room object, and confirms that and exit with the matching direction exists.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • describe

        public java.lang.String describe()
        This method prints the details of the room on the console for the player, taking into consideration its contents, exits and the status of the Rooms boolean hasBeen variable. If it is false the Room title and description variables are formated and printed to the console. If is is true then only the title is printed to the console. For both conditions the Item and NPC object names are formated and printed to the console.
        Returns:
        message string to be printed to the console

      • leaveBy

        public Room leaveBy(java.lang.String dir)
        Takes a single character, representing a direction which to exit a Room object, and confirms that and exit with the matching direction exists. If the exit direction is present the exit's destination Room object is return, otherwise the return value is set to null.
        Parameters:
        dir - single character representing the potential direction an exit
        Returns:
        the destination room object

      • devPrintRoomContents

        public void devPrintRoomContents()
        Development test method used to check room contents by printing a list to the console.
